p:
Raw sequence reads were assembled into contigs using Sequencher software (version 5, Gene Codes Corporation, Ann Arbor, USA). Multiple sequence alignments (MSA) were prepared using MAFFT v7.220
36 . Phylogenetic trees were constructed in MEGA v.6.0
37 with maximum likelihood methods under the GTR model and branch support was assessed using 1000 bootstrap iterations. Types were assigned based on >90% nucleotide similarity to rhinovirus prototype sequences (also referred to as reference sequences)
13, 14 and phylogenetic clustering with the reference sequences (with a bootstrap support value above 70%).
